ammunition.Name: Bolt
ammunition.Lore:
Ammunition used for crossbows. 
A widespread, common type of bolt.

ammunition.Name: Magicbone Arrow
ammunition.Lore:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. 
The tip is daubed with a glintstone tincture. Deals magic damage. 
Craftable item.

ammunition.Name: Serpent Arrow
ammunition.Lore:
Arrow carved to resemble a flying snake. Used in tandem with the Serpent Bow. � 
 Loyal minions of the Formless Serpents, their fangs are daubed with deadly poison.

ammunition.Name: Lightningbone Bolt
ammunition.Lore:
Bolt crafted from animal bone with a lightning-infused tip. Deals lightning damage. 
Craftable item.

ammunition.Name: Bloodbone Arrow (Fletched)
ammunition.Lore:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with a blood tincture. 
The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight. 
Craftable item.

ammunition.Name: Stormwing Bone Arrow
ammunition.Lore:
Arrow whittled from animal bones fletched with stormhawk feathers. 
Craftable item. 

Flies enshrouded in storm winds, breaking enemy stances and guards with ease.

ammunition.Name: Rotbone Bolt
ammunition.Lore:
Bolt carved from animal bone. The tip is daubed with rot. Afflicts targets with scarlet rot. 
Craftable item.

ammunition.Name: Firebone Bolt
ammunition.Lore:
Bolt carved from animal bone. The tip is set alight before firing. Deals fire damage. 
 Craftable item.

ammunition.Name: Coldbone Arrow
ammunition.Lore:
Arrow whittled from animal bones with a frozen tip. 
Afflicts targets with frost. 
Craftable item.

ammunition.Name: Firebone Arrow (Fletched)
ammunition.Lore:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. 
The tip is set alight before firing. 
Deals fire damage to foes.

ammunition.Name: Poisonbone Arrow
ammunition.Lore:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. 
The tip is daubed with venom. 
Afflicts targets with poison. 
Craftable item.

ammunition.Name: Golem's Magic Arrow
ammunition.Lore:
Greatarrow of black stone crafted by a civilization now gone to ruin. Imbued with its ancient magic. 
Deals magic damage.

ammunition.Name: Firebone Arrow
ammunition.Lore:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. 
The tip is set alight before firing

ammunition.Name: Perfumer's Bolt
ammunition.Lore:
Bolt created with perfumer techniques. Used by nobles' guards and the like. 
 The point of impact explodes with sparks, dealing fire damage.

ammunition.Name: Haligbone Bolt
ammunition.Lore:
Bolt carved from animal bone. The tip is daubed with a golden tincture. Deals holy damage. 
Craftable item.

ammunition.Name: Black-Key Bolt
ammunition.Lore:
Bolts used in Crepus' Black-Key Crossbow, an assassin's tool of exquisite craftmanship. 
 The intricate spiral tip bores deep, injecting scarlet rot far into the flesh of its target.

ammunition.Name: Haligbone Arrow (Fletched)
ammunition.Lore:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with a golden tincture. Deals holy damage. 
Craftable item. The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

ammunition.Name: Explosive Bolt
ammunition.Lore: Bolt tipped with a shard of Explosive Stone. Explodes on impact, dealing fire damage.

ammunition.Name: Shattershard Arrow (Fletched)
ammunition.Lore: Arrow whittled from animal bones tipped with a shard of crystal. Creates a resonating noise at the point of impact.

ammunition.Name: Radahn's Spear
ammunition.Lore:
Greatarrows used by the General Radahns during the festival of combat. These are in fact the many spears with which he was stabbed by the Cleanrot Knights. 

Imbued with Radahn's gravitational power.

ammunition.Name: Bone Ballista Bolt
ammunition.Lore:
Greatbolt as large as a spear carved from stout animal bones. Craftable item. 
 Though the tip is certainly sharp, it does not fly particularly true.

ammunition.Name: Bone Arrow
ammunition.Lore:
Arrow whittled from thin animal bones. 
Though the arrowhead is sharp indeed, it doesn't fly particularly true.

ammunition.Name: Arrow
ammunition.Lore:
Arrows used with small and long bows. 
Unremarkable in any way, shape or form.

ammunition.Name: Bone Bolt
ammunition.Lore:
Bolt carved from a thin animal bone. Craftable item. 
 Though the tip is certainly sharp, it does not fly particularly true.

ammunition.Name: Bone Great Arrow (Fletched)
ammunition.Lore:
Greatarrow as large as a spear whittled from stout animal bones. 
Craftable item. 
The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

ammunition.Name: Ballista Bolt
ammunition.Lore: Greatbolt as large as a spear for use with Hand Ballista.

ammunition.Name: Rainbow Stone Arrow
ammunition.Lore:
Arrow whittled from animal bones tipped with chips of Rainbow Stone. Colored lights shine at the point of impact. 
 
 Craftable item.

ammunition.Name: Burred Bolt
ammunition.Lore:
Bolt covered in thorns. One of the most horrific weapons used in the Shattering. Afflicts with blood loss. 
 Diffcult to remove once buried in flesh, causes appalling damage to the body

ammunition.Name: Meteor Bolt
ammunition.Lore:
Enchanted work of craft made in tandem with Full Moon Crossbow. The tip is embedded with glintstone. 
 Like a shooting star, these bolts leave a beautiful trail when fired. �Deals magic damage.

ammunition.Name: Sleepbone Arrow
ammunition.Lore:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. 
The tip is daubed with a water lily tincture. 
Afflicts targets with drowsiness. 
Craftable item.

ammunition.Name: Sleepbone Bolt
ammunition.Lore:
Bolt carved from animal bone. The tip is daubed with a waterlily tincture. 
Afflicts targets with sleep.

ammunition.Name: Lightningbone Arrow
ammunition.Lore:
Arrow whittled from animal bones with a lightning-infused tip. Deals lightning damage. 
 
Craftable item.

ammunition.Name: Fire Arrow
ammunition.Lore:
Arrow with the tip set alight. �
Deals fire damage.

ammunition.Name: Lightning Greatbolt
ammunition.Lore:
Greatbolt tipped with a clump of Gravel Stone shards. � 
 Deals powerful lightning damage.

ammunition.Name: Haligbone Arrow
ammunition.Lore:
Arrow whittled From animal bones. The tip is daubed with a golden tincture. Deals holy damage. 
Craftable item.

ammunition.Name: Golden Bolt
ammunition.Lore:
Bolt blessed with an incantation of the Erdtree. Deals powerful holy damage
 
 Once used by guards of the Capital.

ammunition.Name: Poisonbone Arrow (Fletched)
ammunition.Lore:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. 
The tip is daubed with venom. 
Afflicts targets with poison. 
Craftable item. 
The addition of fletching enables more precise shots that can travel farther.

ammunition.Name: Bone Great Arrow
ammunition.Lore:
Greatarrow as large as a spear whittled from stout animal bones. 
Though the tip is certainly sharp, it does not fly particularly true.

ammunition.Name: Golden Great Arrow
ammunition.Lore:
Carved greatarrows made together with the Erdtree Greatbow. Deals holy damage. 
 
 Imbued with an oath-sworn incantation, which boosts the attack and defense of the archer and their nearby allies.

ammunition.Name: St. Trina's Arrow
ammunition.Lore:
Arrow carved to resemble a withered water lily. Afflicts targets
with a powerful sleep effect. 
 Priests of St. Trina use these arrows to spread their teachings. The sweet oblivion of sleep can become quite the habit.

ammunition.Name: Bone Arrow (Fletched)
ammunition.Lore:
Arrow whittled from thin animal bones. 
The feather fletchings add distance and accuracy to the standard bone arrow.

ammunition.Name: Coldbone Arrow (Fletched)
ammunition.Lore:
Arrow whittled from animal bones with a frozen tip. 
Afflicts targets with frost. 
Craftable item. The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

ammunition.Name: Magicbone Arrow (Fletched)
ammunition.Lore:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with a glintstone tincture. 
Deals magic damage. 
 
Craftable item. The Retching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

ammunition.Name: Flaming Bolt
ammunition.Lore:
Bolt with a fiercely burned tip. Deals powerful fire damage. 
 Used by survivors of Radahn's army to stave off the scarlet rot.

ammunition.Name: Rotbone Arrow
ammunition.Lore:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with rot. Afflicts targets with scarlet rot. 
Craftable item.

ammunition.Name: Lightningbone Arrow (Fletched)
ammunition.Lore:
Arrow whittled from animal bones with a lightning-infused tip. Deals lightning damage. 
 
Craftable item. The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

ammunition.Name: Great Arrow
ammunition.Lore:
A greatarrow as large as a spear for use with greatbows. 
Used by archers of monstrous strength employed by a lord's army.

ammunition.Name: Dwelling Arrow
ammunition.Lore:
Arrow in which the spirits of small animals are thought to dwell. 
Deals magic damage.

ammunition.Name: Sleepbone Arrow (Fletched)
ammunition.Lore:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. 
The tip is daubed with a water lily tincture. 
Afflicts targets with drowsiness. 
Craftable item. 
The addition of fletching enables more precise shots that can travel farther.

ammunition.Name: Golden Arrow
ammunition.Lore:
Carved arrows made in tandem with the Erdtree Bow. Deals holy damage. � 
 Highly effective against Those Who Live in Death, and able to prevent them from rising again.

ammunition.Name: Explosive Greatbolt
ammunition.Lore:
Greatbolt tipped with a clump of Explosive Stone shards. 
Detonates a large explosion on impact, dealing fire damage.

ammunition.Name: Lordsworn's Bolt
ammunition.Lore:
Well-crafted bolt with an illustrious design, wielded by regulars of a lord's army. 
 Deals more damage by its commonplace cousin.

ammunition.Name: Golem's Great Arrow
ammunition.Lore:
Greatarrow of black stone crafted by a civilization now gone to ruin. 
Used by the Guardian Golem. 
This hefty arrow is enrobed in tempestuous winds, allowing it to break enemy stances and guards with ease.

ammunition.Name: Spiritflame Arrow
ammunition.Lore:
Arrow set alight with ghostflame before firing. Deals magic damage while also afflicting foes with frost. 
 Used by the Company of the Fallen Hawk, once ordered to explore the Eternal City.

ammunition.Name: Coldbone Bolt
ammunition.Lore:
Bolt carved from animal bone with a frozen tip. 
Afflicts targets with frost. 
Craftable item.

ammunition.Name: Magicbone Bolt
ammunition.Lore:
Bolt carved from animal bone. The tip is daubed with a glintstone tincture. Deals magic damage. 
Craftable item.

ammunition.Name: Rainbow Stone Arrow (Fletched)
ammunition.Lore:
Arrow whittled from animal bones tipped with chips of Rainbow Stone. 
Colored light shines at the point of impact. 
Craftable item. The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

ammunition.Name: Shattershard Arrow
ammunition.Lore: Arrows whittled from animal bones tipped with a shard of crystal. Creates a resonating noise at the point of impact.

ammunition.Name: Bloodbone Arrow
ammunition.Lore:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with a blood tincture. 
Afflicts targets with blood loss.

ammunition.Name: Rotbone Arrow (Fletched)
ammunition.Lore:
Arrow whittled from animal bones. The tip is daubed with rot. Afflicts targets with scarlet rot. 
Craftable item. The fletching adds distance to the arrow's flight.

ammunition.Name: Bloodbone Bolt
ammunition.Lore:
Bolt carved from animal bone. The tip is daubed with a blood tincture. Afflicts targets with blood loss. 
Craftable item.

ammunition.Name: Poisonbone Bolt
ammunition.Lore:
Bolt carved from animal bone. The tip is daubed with venom. Afflicts targets with poison. 
Craftable item.
